login.title: Log in to account
login.toggleLegacy: Have a legacy account? Login with username

errors.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email before signing in.
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.noPasswordSet: No password set for this account. Try signing in with Google.
errors.genericErrorRetry: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.oauthFailed: Failed to sign in with {provider}. Please try again.
errors.passkeyFailed: Failed to sign in with passkey. Please try again.
